name: Space Shooter (itch) (XarisG)
description:
Space Shooter game that began as a very basic game from a webinar on Game Development with Unity.

Apart from most of the gameplay that was programmed following the tutorial I also added functionalities such as: Control Rebinding, Global Leaderboards etc.

All music used is owned by Widek, whose music can be found here: https://widekmusic.bandcamp.com
